summary: Replaces the sound when you draw a sword to one thats less high pitched
descriptionHtml:
When drawing your sword or long blade I didn\'t like the default sound.
It\'s hard to describe but it was a bit too high pitched.
So I have replaced it with this one.
Extract the Sound folder into the Data folder:
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim\\Data\\

Latest version is 1.1
Made it sync up with the animation better.
author: MasterVampire
